column4: when runmning dd i get this dd: reading `/dev/cdrom': Input/output error
are you just trying to copy a CD?
won't necessarily work if the DVD is copy-protected
it fails on k9copy... but every other dvd has worked with k9copy
coudl it be a wierd copy protection or are there other libs i should get
there's lots of different copy protections, they changed after css was cracked
its wierd how i own my own movies but cant access them
is there a list you know of that i should download
you can find workaround on the web...a lot of them are basically "have mplayer play it, but dump the video into a file" kind of things
